description: Manage your global trade operations and compliance while reducing operational risk by defining and enforcing global trade regulations and corporate policies. Our AI-powered solutions automate, streamline, and simplify import-export compliance for businesses of all sizes, minimizing the risk of non-compliance and protecting business interests.
role: Independently overhauled and deployed 2 existing products within a stringent one-week timeline, demonstrating exceptional project management and technical skills.
